New Records: Zach Neto is the first Angels infielder with a 20-homer, 20-steal season.
Key Match Events: Zach Neto hit a two-run home run during the fifth inning.
Rookie Jack Kochanowicz pitched six scoreless innings.
Ben Joyce got the final four outs for his third save.
Mickey Moniak’s double in the fourth inning gave the Angels a 1-0 lead.
Detroit had runners on the corners with one out in the sixth, but Kochanowicz got Jace Jung to hit into a 4-6-3 double play.
Joey Wentz was hit by two hard comebackers in the seventh inning.
Detroit loaded the bases with two out in the eighth, but Joyce struck out Spencer Torkelson.
Post-Match Reflections: Zach Neto expressed his joy about achieving the 20-homer, 20-steal milestone.
Angels manager Ron Washington praised Jack Kochanowicz for his improvement and performance.
Tigers manager A.J. Hinch reflected on missed opportunities during the game.
